template.description: Confirmation form for rebuilding the article cache.
template.html:
Are you sure you want to rebuild the body of every article?
Points to consider:
  • Older articles could become broken.
  • If you have a few thousand articles, the articles system may be unavailable for a very long time. You may also want to ensure the site is not left idle to ensure the app-pool doesn't recycle during this process.
  • This process will put a heavy load on the database; hence this should not be executed during peak times.
